attributes.action: Make fireworks silent to stop the distress of animals
attributes.additional_details: Fireworks cause unnecessary distress and even death for animals because of the loud noise. There is no need for them to be so loud, so I am petitioning for them to be made silent. Loud fireworks need to be made illegal.
attributes.background: Stop the unnecessary stress for animals with the banning of loud fireworks and the introduction of silent fireworks.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700223
